title: [BUG]A potential bug of NULL pointer dereference
body:
there is a potential bug of null pointer dereference.In **file dict.c,line 75,**function **_dicInit** is called and ht act as the first parameter.In **line 81**,function **_dictReset** is called and in line 66~line 69,there are several statement will execute by derefer ht,which can be null.

![Snipaste_2021-08-07_12-29-02](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/87304478/128587980-1fab4f32-432c-4d6e-80a3-ee7eceb05867.png)


Would you help to check whether this is a true bug? Thanks very much.
